MemoryInfobox.description: 'With Mestor (Samian)|Mestor's plan uncovered and the Persian ships on their way, Herodotos and Kassandra set out to defend Samos before it was too late.'

General_Description: '''Defense of Samos''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]] and a memory of Layla herself.
Section_Description: Kassandra and [[Herodotos]] saw the [[Persia]]n fleet arriving at [[Samos]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra boarded the [[Adrestia]] and approached the fleet.

*'''Herodotos:''' ''We can't let them reach Samos. It's up to us.''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''There they are! Persian ships!''

With two destroyed.

*'''Herodotos:''' ''Destroy them all!''

With all the ships destroyed, she spoke with Herodotos.

*'''Herodotos:''' ''Samos is safe.''
*'''Kassandra:''''' What about [[Mestor]]?''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''After his faulure, he won't get a second chance. Plus, there's no way he'd stay on Samos now.''

<tabber>
|-|(If Theodoros was accused)=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''About [[Theodoros]]... It was my fault you accused him.''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''But only because I didn't trust myself enough to do so.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''But you trusted me.''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''My trust in you was sound. It was still ''my'' choice to accuse him, not yours.''

|-|(If Mestor was accused)=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Theodoros has changed.''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''He's the Theodoros I remembered. He was always willing to admit fault. It's a trait too few people share.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Then you believe things will be OK? Even if you leave Samos again?''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''Of course. Theodoros has work to do here, and he understands mine is elsewhere.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Good.''

</tabber>

*'''Herodotos:''' ''Thank you for everything, Kassandra. Without you, I couldn't have gotten through this.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra defeated the four Persian ships with the [[Adrestia]].
Section_Trivia: Even though they are Persian ships, they are listed as Pirate vessels.
